roleset.name: no longer alive, active, in play
roleset.note: DEAD-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, die-v.01, death-n.01, deaden-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls disappearance-48.2.(from dead.01-j)

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: Prae Ira's revenge was complete- King Zozel the Tenth was dead by his hand.

roleset.name: 'you are dead to me': sworn off, no longer acknowledged
roleset.note: DEAD-J NOTES: Added by Julia. No VNcls (from dead.02-j)

role.descr: perciever, entity who has sworn off arg1

example.name: both args
example.text: He was dead to me after what he did to the Ramones.
example.arg: after what he did to the Ramones

roleset.name: numb, unresponsive to a stimulus
roleset.note: DEAD-J NOTES: Added by Julia. No VNcls. (from dead.03-j)

role.descr: stimulus to which arg1 doesn't respond

example.name: both args
example.text: Passersby were dead to our pleas for help.

roleset.name: deathly, toxic
roleset.note: DEADLY-J NOTES: Based on ontonouns. No comparison. Framed by Katie. (from deadly.01-j)

example.name: both args
example.text: Chocolate is supposedly deadly for dogs 9
